characterInfo.Family: Lopen (nephew), Punio (nephew?), Lopen's Mother (sister?),  Huio (nephew?), Rod (nephew?)

characterDescription:
Chilinko is Lopen's uncle. He lived in Little Herdaz, which was in Highprince Sebarial's warcamp on the Shattered Plains.
Chilinko harbors former King Elhokar therein after the assassination attempt by Moash and Graves.
He informs Lopen in the Herdazian language that word had come from Sebarial that something had been found on the Plains, that they all might be moving soon. He insisted that Lopen see to the king's welfare.
